citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There are accumulations of hair on the sides of wire enclosures and dust accumulating on walls especially
by the fan. Animal facilities must be kept clean to ensure good quality of the air for the rabbits and to prevent unnecessary
disease risks. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including: removing accumulations of dust and hair; and
maintaining a level of general cleanliness to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by March 22, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There are accumulations of hair on the sides of wire enclosures and dust accumulating on walls especially 
by the fan. Animal facilities must be kept clean to ensure good quality of the air for the rabbits and to prevent unnecessary 
disease risks. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including: removing accumulations of dust and hair; and 
maintaining a level of general cleanliness to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by March 22, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
